name: Dedicated spot in the Sponsors Lounge
desc: This isn’t a boring booth surrounded with 100 other sponsors. We’re keeping things casual with comfy sofas in a dedicated lounge area – let our attendees flock to you! It’s the perfect opportunity to meet all the great people in the room, demo your product or talk to future hires over coffee (or a beer later during the day!).

name: Promotional item or flyer in goodie bag
desc: Treat attendees with a useful goodie, like a portable phone charger, a branded pair of socks for the long winter nights, a bag of popcorn for the way back. You can also insert a special postcard, flyer, sticker or anything you want attendees to take back home (or to the office!) – surprise them, they’ll love it!

name: Attendee experience
desc: Very twittable branded cupcakes, a special cocktail, a live performance show – We’ll work with you to craft the perfect experience for a memorable interaction with the JAM crowd. There is no crazy idea, and we'd love to hear what you have in mind!

name: Branded photo booth
desc: Who doesn’t like a good old gif? When the after party starts, it’s photo booth time! Place your logo (and/or a special hashtag) on the booth background and watch it being shared on twitter and the likes – Want to organise a photo contest? Have a special giveaway to maximise exposure? Let’s make it happen!

name: Dedicated email to all attendees pre or post event
